column1: Little Goat Diner////Once we got our food
column2: the omelettes were disproportionately eggy and hammy (and light on the flavorful sauce and mushroom innards). The loco moco was a mockery of any loco moco we've ever experienced. Moco was over-designed with an emphasis on greens
column3: making us miss the Hawaiian simplicity of the usual easy island dish
column4: while the omelette suffered from the opposite issue and was too unadorned and unimaginative. Someone else in our party ordered a chicken salad and the chicken was far too breaded.
